author: Veronika Kero
title: 16 fitness deals to help you get fit from your living room
description: Despite how you may feel about it, going to the gym is not an essential reason to leave your house. Sorry. What is essential, though, is staying active despite being stuck at home. Maintaining a fitness routine while social distancing will help keep you fit, …
